summary.span: 命名空間包含的類別可讓您在網頁上建立 Web 伺服器控制項。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that allow you to create Web server controls on a Web page.

summary.span: Web 伺服器控制項在伺服器上執行，並包含按鈕和文字方塊之類的表單控制項。

span.span: Web server controls run on the server and include form controls such as buttons and text boxes.

summary.span: 它們也包含特殊目的控制項，例如行事曆。

span.span: They also include special-purpose controls such as a calendar.

summary.span: 因為 Web 伺服器控制項是在伺服器上執行，所以您可以用程式的方式控制這些項目。

span.span: Because Web server controls run on the server, you can programmatically control these elements.

summary.span: 雖然 Web 伺服器控制項會呈現為 HTML，但它們的物件模型不一定反映 HTML 語法。

span.span: Although Web server controls are rendered as HTML, their object model does not necessarily reflect HTML syntax.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間包含類別，例如會轉譯為 HTML 標記控制項和控制項。The namespace contains classes that are rendered as HTML tags, such as the control and the control. 命名空間也包含類別，不會呈現在網頁上，但支援的資料作業，例如和類別。The namespace also contains classes that are not rendered on the Web page, but support data operations, such as the and classes. 其他控制項，例如和控制項、 支援的資料顯示和編輯。Other controls, such as the and controls, support data display and editing. 類別可做為基底類別中的類別的許多命名空間。The class serves as the base class for many of the classes in the namespace.
